tool_description: GST Return Filing Status for India
name: GST Return Status
title: GST Return Status

api_list.name: /gstin
api_list.description:
Get Details about GSTIN (GST number) and following 
1. Latest Return filing list
2. GST Compliance Classification
3. HSN/SAC
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gst-return-status.p.rapidapi.com/free/gstin/27AAJCM9929L1ZM"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gst-return-status.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gst-return-status.p.rapidapi.com/free/gstin/{gstin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gst-return-status.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
